title: #235 - Sally Haslanger
itunes:title: #235 - Sally Haslanger
description: After reading a recent paper from Professor of Philosophy at MIT Sally Haslanger, Dan decides to launch into a discussion about racism, ideology, and how progressive-minded people should go about enacting change in the world. Of course, because of recent news stories, the conversation turns from racism to sexism and ignorance of the patriarchy. But, don't worry, they manage to goof around somewhere in their too.
